content.text: MOMENT OF SILENCE IN MEMORY OF THE VICTIMS OF THE ATTACK IN SUTHERLAND
content.speaker: Unknown

content.text:
The SPEAKER. The Chair would ask all present to rise for the purpose 
of a moment of silence.


  The Chair asks that the House now observe a moment of silence in 
memory of the victims of the attack in Sutherland Springs, Texas.
content.speaker: The SPEAKER

doc_title: MOMENT OF SILENCE IN MEMORY OF THE VICTIMS OF THE ATTACK IN SUTHERLAND SPRINGS, TEXAS
